entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
